reviewText: If you like Densel Washington, Morgan Freeman, and many more actors like these- whose acting  ability surpasses your expectations, your going to really enjoy this star lacked trio!
A Good Older Denzel Movie package with Glory and Devil in a Blue Dress. Denzel and Don Cheadel and Howard Rollins look so young in this move. Its worth the price.

Movie were delivered earlier than eta, great quality.
Thanks
Love Denzel.  I think Devil in a Blue Dress is one of his more underrated performances. Don Cheadle was excellent.
it works just fine.....if u need one this the one to get....I would buy it again if I need too...I bought it for Devil in a blue dress but I love the other two as well...
Love the packaging and the fact that it was a combination deal. very good quality and sound could not be happier.

I'm a fan of Denzel Washington's work.  However, I never saw Devil in A Blue Dress.  So, I searched for it on Amazon and came across this triple pack.  The price was too hard to believe at first.  Then my common sense kicked in and told me that this (amazon.com) is a reliable website.  I was greatly pleased with this product.

you have 3 classic movies in one package this is one deal you should not pass up each movie is on its own disc they all play great I should have bought 2 instead of 1 because the 1 I did buy was for my girl
